title: Snow disrupts flights at Manchester Airport | Granada - ITV News
text:
28 February 2017 at 9:19am Snow disrupts flights at Manchester Airport 
The runway at Manchester Airport has shut temporarily to clear snow. 
Some flights have been delayed and passengers are advised to allow more time to reach the airport in the wintery conditions. Work is underway to clear the runway at Manchester Airport Credit: Clare Nasir 
Sorry, this content isn't available on your device. Last updated Tue 28 Feb 2017
